Home.indexCompanyPara:
KinetixAI is an AI Robotics company building World-leading VLA models and humanoid robots. We are based in Shenzhen , Kai's mission is to deploy humanoid robots on a large scale across all scenarios and ultimately help them evolve into silicon-based intelligence.

​
Home.indexTechSTit: From the 'Five Core Technologies' to' Silicon based Life '

Company.introPara:
KinetixAI is an AI Robotics company on a mission to build a world where humanoid robots empower humanity across every scenario.

Based in Shenzhen, we're developing world-leading Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models and general-purpose humanoid robots. We believe that to truly reshape the future of work and life, humanoid robots must seamlessly integrate into real-world environments and continuously evolve alongside us—ultimately advancing into silicon-based intelligence that enhances human capabilities at scale.

​
